articles.title: Google brings spatial audio to Pixel 7 and Pixel 6 phones - Engadget
articles.description: The tech giant is rolling out the feature with the rest of the January 2023 security updates for the Pixel 6, Pixel 6 Pro, Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro..
articles.content: Google has been working on giving its Pixel phone users access to spatial audio since at least September last year. Now, the tech giant is finally rolling out the feature with the rest of the January… [+1404 chars]
